A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had to give atleast 2 stars because it’s a starwars movie. Aside from a few scenes that made true starwars fans happy the movie felt like it was rushed\, uncomfortable\, and full of forced laughs... the story was non existent. It left you with no desire to see the next one\, and also no clue with that it’ll be about! Very sad that I wasted 2 years being excited to see this movie only to be let completely down.
